welcometext: Foodle is a service for simple surveys or polls and for scheduling meetings.
newfoodlecontent: Welcome to a brand new implementation of Foodle! We kindly ask you to report any issues you might have concerning this new edition as soon as possible, in order to help us get rid of bugs.
title: Title
locationenable: There is a location for this event
ac: Create an Adobe Connect Meeting room for this event
maybeenable: Allow users to respond with «maybe» on columns
datetimeenabled: The date and time has already been decided for this event
deadlineenable: There is a deadline for responding to this Foodle
deadlinetxt: If a deadline is set, users are note allowed to respond after this deadline
restrictionsinfo: Restrictions on what users may respond
restr1: Maximum number of checked responses to this specific column
publishfeed2: Publish this Foodle to a feed
feedinfo: By publishing to a feed, users member of that feed will get access to the foodles from their frontpage. It may also be visible in Foodle widgets placed in other web applications
logininfo: It is reccomended to require all users to login. Then you'll be sure that each user may only respond once, and you will know the identity behind each response
deletewarning: Are you really sure you would like to delete this Foodle? There is no way to restore the deleted data. Both the Foodle and all the responses to this foodle will be deleted.
providefeedback: Please let us know what you think
saveinfo: Your Foodle is now ready to be shared. Please send the following link to your participant in order for them to access and respond to the Foodle
coltype2: Dates and timeslots (same timeslots for all dates)
coltype3: Dates and timeslots (different timeslots for different dates)
